snippet.title: Tetragon — Announcement Trailer [PEGI]
snippet.description:
Tetragon is a vast mysterious universe of unique puzzles, magical mazes, and challenges! Your goal is to move the plane realities using the spinning world gravity wisely. Test your mind and guide the brave lumberjack through the scattered worlds in search of his lost son!

A playable demo is available now on Steam, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch and Playstation 4 (plus Xbox Series consoles and PlayStation 5 via backwards compatibility). The full version launches across all platforms on August 12th.

Feel free to try Tetragon on Steam — https://store.steampowered.com/app/1545850
